title: 1849 (GOG)
description:
Hey guys, here 1849. It includes all of the bonus content. Hope you guys enjoy and please help seed.


--------------------


Bonus content included for FREE with purchase: 

- 2 wallpapers 

- 4 Avatars


--------------------


What's cool about it:


- A campaign mode that traces the development of the Gold Rush from mining camps to bustling cities. Each city scenario presents players with unique starting conditions, victory goals, and obstacle events.

- Sandbox mode with a procedurally-generated map for your location, based on geography (from the Pacific coast to the Sierra Nevada mountains), precipitation, resource availability, and starting lot size.

- Vivid old west towns with buildings lining the streets directly inspired by CaliforniaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Gold Country.

- Over 50 resources that players can dig up, farm, refine or manufacture as they build complex towns and cities.


Overview:

The year is 1849, and gold has just been discovered in California. You decide to head out west, to seek fame and wealth in the approaching Gold Rush. Will you strike gold and become an overnight mining magnate? Or will you build your fortune bit by bit by supplying 49ers with pickaxes and blue jeans?

1849 is a city management game set during the California Gold Rush. Your task is to build towns, populate them with workers, and make sure that they are housed, fed, and entertained. YouÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll have to manage and coordinate extensive production and trade networks to make sure your towns thrive.
